comments.content:
so that's who bought the last box at Wallacks!   
   
great stuff, I love her.
My kids did something similar early on in their school career, in a medium known as "Macaroni on cardboard". Only that was more technically complex, because the macaroni wasn't self-adhesive.
ooo Nick - tisk tisk...your just jealous you didn't think of it with your letraset.

Tanya, you are so right.   
I have dozens of sheets of the stuff, haven't used it for years, but now I know it was worth hanging on to. What a great retirement hobby this will make! I just checked my Letraset markers, and they still smell great, so looks like I'm all set.
